entry.title: Sports Attack Pitching Machine Feeders
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sports Attack
Type: Pitching Machine
Price: 579.99 - 1979.99 (2 variants)

Sports Attack Feeders

Solo Feeder

Extremely portable 15 baseball capacity Solo Feeder provides adjustable intervals between pitches. Feeds both the Hack Attack and Junior Hack Attack.

Team Feeder

The 150 ball capacity Team Feeder will feed a baseball into the Hack Attack or Junior every 5.5 – 6.5 seconds for continuous hitting time of 20 minutes. Feeds both Hack Attack and Junior Hack Attack.

entry.title: Hack Attack Jr Pitching Machine 3 Wheel Machine
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sports Attack
Type: Pitching Machine
Price: 2579.99

Hack Attack Jr Pitching Machine

The Hack Attack Jr. machine still has a unique three-wheel design allows you to see the baseball clearly all the way through the feeding motion of the pitching machine, acceleration and release, just like a live pitcher.  The Jr machine throws a maximum of 70 mph and is designed for youth and high school age or below.

The angled 3 wheel design allows the hitter to see when to stride and also the angle of release, giving him an actual live-arm sense of timing and location.

Highlights

  • Designed for youth and high school level
  • 3 Wheel Design throws Breaking Pitches or Fastballs
  • Visible ball path for timing
  • Excellent timing for a wheel machine
  • Easy adjustment on breaking/pitch plane
  • Throws fungo's, pop ups, grounds...multi-use
  • Portable and easy to use
  • No Assembly Required, Ready to Use out of Box
Machine Details

The quick dial adjustment allows you to easily throw major league fastballs, and right and left handed breaking pitches including curveballs, sliders and split finger pitches.

The hack attack three-wheel design changes the breaking pitch plane by adjusting wheel speed dials. (Most competing two-wheel units require difficult and time consuming adjustments to the throwing head to change from pitch selection or right to left handed breaking pitches.)
    
The unique elevation adjustment handle can raise or lower the pitch with a simple turn. You can the pitch up or down within the strike zone between pitches. (Many other two-wheel pitching machines require you to use a release mechanism, reposition the entire throwing head by tilting it manually and then re-locking the locking mechanism.)

The hack attack pitching machine head pivots instantly in any direction for all fungo and fielding work including; fly balls, slicing line drives, catcher's pop-ups with reverse spin, towering infield pop-ups, and grounders.
    
The Sports Attack pitching machine family makes the most efficient use of practice time with limited throwing head adjustments needed and an almost instant recovery time. This means more strikes delivered to your hitters at every practice.
    
The hack attack pitching machines is portable and can quickly move on and off field. It is easy to tilt it, unsocket legs and easily roll on two transporting wheels. The front wheel guards insure the throwing wheels never come in contact with the ground. (Some machines are moved using throwing wheels, picking up dangerous dirt and gravel which causes inaccuracy and wear.)
   
The Sports Attack pitching machines are designed for use with regulation leather baseballs, dimpled practice balls, Wiffle® balls and all softer practice balls. The Junior Hack Attack will also convert to throw a 7.5” undersized vision training ball.
   
No assembly is required, both pitching machines arrive fully assembled and ready to use.

Specifications
  • Speed 70+ MPH
  • Distance 45 ft. (simulates 90+ MPH)
  • Vision Complete ball vision provides a realistic sense of timing
  • Accuracy The ball is gripped in three locations, providing tremendous control and accuracy
  • Efficiency Dial-in pitch selection without throwing head adjustments, maximizes practice time
  • Fungo 250 ft. fly balls
  • Portability Quickly rolls on and off the field
  • Recovery Time 5 seconds, because of the three wheels, it is almost instant
 Video

Specifications

  • Portability Quickly rolls on and off the field
  • Recovery Time 5 seconds, because of the three wheels, it is almost instant
 Video

entry.title: Iron Mike Pitching Machine Cover
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kodiak Sports, LLC
Type:
Price: 219.99 - 239.99 (2 variants)

Iron Mike Machine Cover

The Masterpitch Iron Mike machine cover protects the machine during inclement weather.  The cover is designed to be used on pitching machines that are outdoors.  Machines that are indoor typically would not require a cover.

Cover is available for MP-5 or MP-6 style of pitching machine.

entry.title: Iron Mike Pitching Machine Guard
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kodiak Sports, LLC
Type:
Price: 329.99

Iron Mike Machine Guard

The Masterpitch Iron Mike machine guard is a steel frame and net that plugs into the bottom of the Iron Mike machine frame to stabilize the guard.  The machine guard protects the machine from batted balls damaging the machine, light, feeding mechanisms.  It is highly recommended to protect your investment.

Specifications
  • Extra Protection from Batted Balls
  • 4' Wide x 6' Tall
  • Heavy #60 Weight Net
  • 1" Galvanized Pipe Framework
  • Held in Place by Machine

entry.title: Sports Tutor Triple Play Ultra Pitching Machine
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sports Tutor
Type: Pitching Machine
Price: 7995.00 - 10185.00 (4 variants)

Triple Play Ultra Pitching Machine

The Triple Play Ultra pitching machine has an attached hopper to hold the baseballs or softballs. The Triple Play Ultra is the ultimate pitching machine for automated computerized pitching machines.  The machine is capable of a major league fastball, followed by a sweeping curve ball.  Game programmable situations are programmable for random pitch control.

Considered a top pitching machine in the industry and often used with the All Star 5000 video pitcher for automated/game situations.

Remote Control Panel Add on gives the player ability to have control panel at home plate rather than at the back of the machine only.  Full control panel mounted on stand.

    Specifications

    Baseball Specs

    • Ball Type: 9” Low Seam Real Baseballs
    • Pitch Speed: 40 to 90 MPH

    Softball Specs

    • Ball Type: 12" Low Seam Real Softballs
    • Pitch Speed: 35 to 70 MPH
    • Ball Capacity: 40 Softballs

    Other

    • Pitch Modes: Sequence, Random, Repeat
    • Programmable: 64 Pitches in 8 Programs
    • Exit Ball Height: 50” to 60” Adjustable
    • Dimensions: 30”W x 32”D x 62”-72”H
    • Power: 115V Grounded Outlet
    • Weight: 190 lbs
    Features
    • Multiple pitches
    • Sounds and lights prior to pitch 
    • Programmable balls and strikes
    • Pitches are stored for future use
    • More accurate than 2 wheeled machines
      Warranty

      Triple Play Ultra is backed by a two year warranty covering both parts and labor. Extended warranties available.

      Shipping Time

      This machine would ship within 5 business days.

entry.title: Triple Play Prime Pitching Machine by Sports Tutor
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sports Tutor
Type: Pitching Machine
Price: 5995.00

Triple Play Prime Pitching Machine

The Triple Play Prime by Sports Tutor is a computerized/programmable pitching machine that offers the stability and pitch control of a 3 wheeled machine; combined with the programmable functions of a fully automated machine.

The Prime machine is hand or feeder fed and can be programmed to throw random pitch sequences or continuous pitches ranging from fastballs, curveballs, sliders from the left or right side.

    Specifications

    Baseball Specs

    • Ball Type: 9” Low Seam Real Baseballs
    • Pitch Speed: 40 to 90 MPH
    • Exit Height: 56″ Above Ground
    • Machine Dimensions: 28”W x 26”D x 62”-72”H

    Softball Specs

    • Ball Type: 12" Dimple Softballs
    • Pitch Speed: 35 to 70 MPH
    • Exit Height: 31″ Above Ground
    • Machine Dimensions: 28”W x 26”D x 42”H

    Other

    • Pitch Modes: Random, Sequence, Repeat
    • Programmable: 64 Pitches in 8 Programs
    • Weight: 190 lbs
    • Power: 115V Grounded Outlet
    Features
    • Detailed Control Panel
    • Programmable balls and strikes
    • Pitches are stored for future use
    • More accurate than 2 wheeled machines
    • Over-sized transport wheels for portability 
      Warranty

      TriplePlay Prime is backed by a two year warranty covering both parts and labor. Extended warranties available.

      Shipping Time

      This machine would ship within 5 business days.

entry.title: Poly Ball Tutor Pitching Machine by Sports Tutor
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sports Tutor
Type: Pitching Machine
Price: 745.00 - 845.00 (4 variants)

Poly Ball Tutor Pitching Machine

The polyball tutor is a wiffle ball pitching machine.  The machine is an excellent training tool for players of all ages to work on hand/eye coordination. The breaking pitches thrown by the poly ball tutor are incredible and it allows younger players to work on hitting the ball without being afraid of being injured or hit by the ball.

The large breaks and fast reaction times help hitters work on proper mechanics; as it is often impossible to consistently connect and drive massive breaking pitches properly without proper bat path and mechanics.

    Specifications
    • Pitch Speed: up to 60 MPH
    • Pitching Interval: 6 seconds
    • Dimensions: 16”L x 11”W x 17”H
    • Height w/Tripod 5-1/2 ft. or 3-1/2 ft
    • Weight (Battery Model): 27 pounds
    • Ball Capacity w/ext. Hopper: 40 balls
    Features
    • Accelerates hitting improvement 
    • Lightweight
    • Baseball sized Polyballs
    • Control Panel
    • Optional: Automatic ball feeder
      Warranty

      Poly Ball Tutor is backed by a three year warranty covering both parts and labor. Extended warranties available.

      Shipping Time

      This machine would ship within 5 business days.

entry.title: Batting Tutor Pitching Machine by Sports Tutor
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sports Tutor
Type: Pitching Machine
Price: 2195.00

Batting Tutor Pitching Machine

The Batting Tutor is newly designed and brings affordable simplicity to the Sports Tutor line of products.  The Batting Tutor throws only fastballs; ranging from 25 mph to 60 mph.  It is designed for youth level and backyard cages; so that the machine can be used unattended without a "feeder" person.

You simply load the baseball in the machine, select the speed of the pitch, use the knob to adjust the height and the machine will throw a pitch every 7-10 seconds.  The hopper can hold up to 140 baseballs; and can be used with low seam leather balls, dimple balls or RIF baseballs.

SAFETY FEATURES

The machine case protects young children from rotating wheels and potentially dangerous mechanical parts; while protecting the machine from batted balls.  It is still recommended that you use a protective feed screen to stop balls from hitting the machine directly; this will prolong the life of the machine/case.

Simply plug it into a standard grounded 115v outlet with your extension cord and it’s ready to use. Safe, simple and affordable!

    Specifications

    Baseball Specs

    • Ball Types: Standard or Low Seam Baseballs, Dimple or RIF Baseballs
    • Pitch Type: Fastballs only
    • Pitch Speed: 30 to 60 MPH
    • Ball Capacity: 140 Baseballs
    • Exit Height: 48” above ground
    • Machine Dimensions: 64”H x 19”W x 30”D

    Softball Specs

    • Ball Types: 12″ Low Seam Softballs, 12″ Dimple or RIF Softballs
    • Pitch Type: Fastballs only
    • Pitch Speed: 30 to 60 MPH
    • Ball Capacity: 70 Softballs
    • Exit Height: 26” above ground
    • Machine Dimensions: 46”H x 19”W x 30”D

    Other

    • Pitch Interval: 10 Seconds
    • Weight: 106 lbs
    • Power: 115V standard grounded outlet
    Features
    • Load up to 140 balls
    • Sounds and lights prior to pitch
    • All weather plastic housing
    • Throws fastballs every 10 seconds
    • Control Panel
    • Auto or manual options 
      Warranty

      Batting Tutor is backed by a three year warranty covering parts and labor. Extended warranties available.

      Shipping Time

      This machine would ship within 5 business days.

      Video

entry.title: Strike One Pitching Machine by Sports Tutor
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sports Tutor
Type: Pitching Machine
Price: 1195.00

Strike One Pitching Machine

The Sports Tutor StrikeOne is a truly portable youth level pitching machine. THe smaller side and built-in carrying handles make it easy to transport and the optional battery pack give the machine to ability to be used anywhere.  The StrikeOne pitching machine is not reliant on 120v power with the battery pack.

StrikeOne can throw real baseballs, Reduced Injury Factor (RIF) balls and dimple balls.  The versatility of the machine make it a valuable tool for youth league practice, and ideal for machine pitch leagues.  It throws fastballs at speeds from 20 MPH to 60 MPH.

    Specifications

    Baseball Specs

    • Ball Types: Standard or Low Seam Baseballs, Dimple or RIF Baseballs
    • Pitch Speed: 20 to 60 MPH
    • Exit Height: 50” above ground
    • Machine Dimensions: 54”H x 14”W x 18”D

    Softball Specs

    • Ball Types: 12″ Low Seam Softballs, 12″ Dimple or RIF Baseballs
    • Pitch Speed: 20 to 60 MPH
    • Exit Height: 26” above ground
    • Machine Dimensions: 30”H x 14”W x 18”D

    Other

    • Weight: 65 pounds
    • Power: 115V standard grounded outlet
    • Optional: 12 VDC battery pack
     Features
    • Throws Fastballs
    • Pitch speed in 5 MPH increments
    • Digital Control Panel
    • Carrying Handles 
      Warranty

      Strike One is backed by a three year warranty covering parts and labor. Extended warranties available.

      Shipping Time

      This machine would ship within 5 business days.

entry.title: Triple Play Pro Pitching Machine by Sports Tutor
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sports Tutor
Type: Pitching Machine
Price: 3495.00

Triple Play Pro Pitching Machine

The Sports Tutor TriplePlay Pro Pitching Machine is a 3 wheeled pitching machine that is digitally controlled to be able to throw multiple pitch types for baseball and softball.  The machine has 6 different pitch configurations at the push of a button; including curveballs, changeups, fastballs, slider and more.  The pitching machine can throw dimple balls or real leather baseballs with flat seams.

This machine is a great training tool for plays that want to see multiple pitch types and train for game type situations. The ball chute allows the hitter to see the ball roll through the machine to help time the pitch.

The TriplePlay Pro is capable of throwing big league level breaking pitches and nasty cut fastballs.  It is an excellent pro level training tool for serious hitters.

    Specifications

    Baseball Specs

    • Ball Types: Low Seam Baseballs, Dimple or RIF Baseballs
    • Pitch Speed: 40 to 90 MPH
    • Exit Height: 56” above ground
    • Machine Dimensions: 65”H x 28”W x 26”D

    Softball Specs

    • Ball Types: 12″ Low Seam Softballs, 12″ Dimple or RIF Softballs
    • Pitch Speed: 35 to 70 MPH
    • Exit Height: 31” above ground
    • Machine Dimensions: 42″H x 28″W x 26″D

    Other

    • Weight: 175 pounds
    • Power: 115V standard grounded outlet
    Features
    • Push button Simplicity
    • Six different pitches at the touch of a button
    • Pitch speed in 5 MPH increments
    • Changing pitches typically takes less than 30 seconds
    • More accurate than two-wheel machines
    • Oversize transport wheels for portability
        Warranty

        TriplePlay Pro is backed by a three year warranty covering both parts and labor. Extended warranties available.

        Shipping Time

        This machine would ship within 5 business days.

        Video

entry.title: Iron Mike MP-5 Pitching Machine
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kodiak Sports, LLC
Type:
Price: 2965.99 - 3159.99 (4 variants)

MP-5 Pitching Machine

The Masterpitch Iron Mike MP-5 is one of the workhorse machines for anyone wanting to take game like swings and get real fastball timing.  The machine arm action is unmatched by ANY machine on the market.

The speed is adjustable from approx. 45mph - 85mph

The machine does not throw off speed pitches; such as curve balls or sliders.  Softball version still throws overhand.

Positive feed control option adds $50 and is a mechanic attachment that helps prevent ball jams.

Specifications
  • 80' Long On/Off Switch to control from home plate area
  • Ball rack fed - 38 baseball or 28 softball capacity
  • Heavy-duty arm and hand system
  • Easily converted from baseball to softball
  • Built-in low voltage remote control with 80-foot cord
  • 4-wheel transport for quick, easy moving
  • Lockable arm guard cover
  • Electrically powered - 115 volt A.C. motor

entry.title: All Star 5000 Video Pitching Simulator for Baseball or Softball
entry.summary:
Vendor: Joyner Technologies
Type: Pitching Machine
Price: 24999.99


Description

The All Star 5000 Video Pitching simulator is the best video pitcher on the market for performance, price, availability and long term return on investment.

Throw curveballs, sliders, sinkers, fastballs all in sequence or random order.  The All Star 5000 comes in baseball or softball model.

The All Star 5000 uses the Sports Tutor computerized pitching machine as the back end machine/throwing technology.  The advantage of this system is that it is using a high volume production quality pitching machine that is already tried and true in the marketplace.  The All Star 5000 team didn't have to "reinvent" and try to create a reliable machine; they leveraged the existing technology and added the most accurate video sync'ing technology to that machine.

Package Details
  • Sports Tutor Pitching Machine & Control Panel Combo
  • Video Projector, Screen, all Electronics for Unit Operation
  • 10 dozen leather baseballs with kevlar flat seams or 6 Dozen Softballs
  • Delivery in lower 48 states
  • Complete ONSITE professional installation and setup

  • Excludes: Onsite Electrical Work, Netting, Hitting Mats, Baseball Equipment, Batting Cage Net/Turf/Cage Structure (cage should already exist)
Features
  • Programmable Multi-pitch system featuring HomePlate pitching machine from Sports Tutor, Inc.
  • Every pitch thrown matches the arm speed on the video.
  • SurePitch® synchronization system ensures that the ball and video are in sync on every pitch, everyday. Guaranteed!
  • Team Rotation Mode ( 5-15 balls/player) or Continuous balls.
  • Programmable Ball interval.
  • Fastballs, Curves, Sliders, etc.
  • LH/RH pitchers.
  • Our pitchers or the ability to film your own.
  • Different pitch types at different speeds at different locations. You choose the pitch!
  • Remote Start/Stop of system.
  • Easy to operate. No computer to boot or hang during practice.
  • Quality built technology.
  • Easy owner setup.
  • Very affordable. Exciting lease options.
